feed.title: VAMOS 2019
feed.subtitle:
13th International Workshop on Variability Modelling of Software-Intensive Systems
February 6-8, 2019, Leuven Belgium

entry.title: Second Keynote Speaker
entry.content: We are delighted to inform you that our second keynote speaker will be Matthias Galster from the University of Canterbury, New Zealand !
entry.summary: We are delighted to inform you that our second keynote speaker will be Matthias Galster from the University of Canterbury, New Zealand !

entry.title: First Keynote Speaker
entry.content: We are delighted to inform you that our first keynote speaker will be Norbert Siegmund from Bauhaus Univeristät Weimar, Germany !
entry.summary: We are delighted to inform you that our first keynote speaker will be Norbert Siegmund from Bauhaus Univeristät Weimar, Germany !

entry.title: Deadline Extension
entry.content: The deadline for all kinds of submission has been extended to November 16 (AOE). This new deadline is strict. Happy Writing !
entry.summary: The deadline for all kinds of submission has been extended to November 16 (AOE). This new deadline is strict. Happy Writing !

entry.title: Acm Proceedings
entry.content: We are happy to announce that the VAMOS 2019 proceedings will be published by ACM.
entry.summary: We are happy to announce that the VAMOS 2019 proceedings will be published by ACM.

entry.title: Call For Papers
entry.content: The CFP is out and the PC list has been completed.
entry.summary: The CFP is out and the PC list has been completed.
